replies.author: 尘曲
replies.txt_content:
dxcfbb 发表于 2014-1-1 17:12 
普通玩家没权限打开全球市场啊，求权限，谢谢
权限
globalmarket.admin - 允许移除上市的物品
globalmarket.util - 允许创建信箱
globalmarket.quickmail -允许 /market mail
globalmarket.create - 允许 /market create
globalmarket.send - 允许 /market send
